newsitem.title: USA: Muni bond sales total $95 mln on Thursday Jan 30.
newsitem.headline: Muni bond sales total $95 mln on Thursday Jan 30.

text.p: Scheduled competitive and negotiated municipal bond sales for Thursday January 30 are expected to total $95 million in 13 offerings, according to Reuters Municipal Bond Information Group.
Competitive sales total $68 million in 9 sales. The largest is a $44 Lowell, Mass., issue at 1100 EST.
Negotiated sales total $28 million in four offerings. The largest is a $13 New Castle Sanitation, Pa., revenue bond issue through Smith Barney Inc.
